channel.title: Ai Fundamentals on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Ai Fundamentals on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 26, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the 2nd chapter of the AI Safety Book, which provides a technical introduction to the fundamentals of AI, including machine learning, neural networks, and deep learning concepts.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 9, 2025
item.description: A diary entry summarizing chapters 1-5 of the ‘Introduction to AI Safety, Ethics, and Society’ textbook, covering catastrophic AI risks, AI fundamentals, single-agent safety, safety engineering, and complex systems.
